scripts.dev: npm run wasm:build:dev && concurrently -k -n WASM,WEB "npm run wasm:watch" "npm --workspace web run dev"
scripts.build: npm run wasm:build:release && npm --workspace web run build
scripts.check: npm run wasm:check && npm run lint
scripts.wasm:build:dev: wasm-pack build sim-wasm --dev --target web --out-dir pkg --out-name sim_wasm
scripts.wasm:build:release: wasm-pack build sim-wasm --release --target web --out-dir pkg --out-name sim_wasm
